43  bool sphere::fitSphere(){
44 
45  transformation_ = Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity();
46 
47  pcl::NormalEstimation<pcl::PointXYZRGBA, pcl::Normal> ne; //
48  pcl::SACSegmentationFromNormals<pcl::PointXYZRGBA, pcl::Normal> seg; //
49  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZRGBA> extract;//
50  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::Normal> extract_normals;
51  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr cloud_normals (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>);
52  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGBA> ());
53  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coefficients_plane (new pcl::ModelCoefficients), coefficients_sphere (new pcl::ModelCoefficients);//
54  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers_plane (new pcl::PointIndices), inliers_sphere (new pcl::PointIndices);
55 
56  ne.setSearchMethod (tree);
57  ne.setInputCloud (original_cloud_);
58  ne.setKSearch (50);
59  ne.compute (*cloud_normals);
60 
61  seg.setOptimizeCoefficients (true);
62  seg.setModelType (pcl::SACMODEL_SPHERE);
63  seg.setMethodType (pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
64  seg.setNormalDistanceWeight (0.1);
65  seg.setMaxIterations (10000);
66  seg.setDistanceThreshold (0.05);
67  seg.setRadiusLimits (0, 0.5);
68  seg.setInputCloud (original_cloud_);
69  seg.setInputNormals (cloud_normals);
70 
71  // Obtain the sphere inliers and coefficients
72  seg.segment (*inliers_sphere, *coefficients_sphere);
73 
74  extract.setInputCloud (original_cloud_);
75  extract.setIndices (inliers_sphere);
76  extract.setNegative (true);
77  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr sphere_points (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>);
78  extract.filter ( *sphere_points );
79 
80  sphere_points_ = sphere_points;
81 
82  if (sphere_points_->points.empty ())
83  {
84  return false;
85  }
86 
87  double radius = coefficients_sphere->values[3];
88  info_.push_back( radius ); //get radius
89 
90  double x = coefficients_sphere->values[0], y = coefficients_sphere->values[1], z = coefficients_sphere->values[2];
91 
92  transformation_(0,3) = x;
93  transformation_(1,3) = y;
94  transformation_(2,3) = z;
95 
96  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr sphere_points_local (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>);
97  Eigen::Matrix4d transformation_i = transformation_.inverse();
98  pcl::transformPointCloud(*original_cloud_, *sphere_points_local, transformation_i);
99  sphere_points_ = sphere_points_local;
100 
101  // int index = info_.size()-1;
102  // info_.push_back((((double)inliers_sphere->indices.size()) / ((double)sphere_points->points.size())));
103  // ROS_INFO("ratio %g", info_[index]);
104 
105  /* info contains: radius, ratio between number of inliers/number of pointCloud points*/
106 
107 
108  return true;
109  }
